judicialResults.label: Imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 2 Years. Reason: there has been a wilful and persistent failure to comply with your community order because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 20.

judicialResults.label: Imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 3 Years. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 12. Total custodial period is life.
